Class ClientStateOverlayFormatter

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.view.tui.formatters.ClientStateOverlayFormatter
All Implemented Interfaces:
ClientStateVisitor
public class ClientStateOverlayFormatter extends Object implements ClientStateVisitor
Formatter that displays all secondary info of a provided ClientState.
